Translations.Text: ya eyyuhe-nnebiyyu kul liezvacike vebenatike venisai-lmu'minine yudnine `aleyhinne min celabibihinn. zalike edna ey yu`rafne fela yu'zeyn. vekane-llahu gafurar rahima
leil lem yentehi-lmunafikune vellezine fi kulubihim meraduv velmurcifune fi-lmedineti lenugriyenneke bihim summe la yucaviruneke fiha illa kalila
mel`unin. eyne ma sukifu uhizu vekuttilu taktila
sunnete-llahi fi-llezine halev min kabl. velen tecide lisunneti-llahi tebdila
yes'eluke-nnasu `ani-ssa`ah. kul innema `ilmuha `inde-llah. vema yudrike le`alle-ssa`ate tekunu kariba
halidine fiha ebeda. la yecidune veliyyev vela nesira
yevme tukallebu vucuhuhum fi-nnari yekulune ya leytena eta`ne-llahe veeta`ne-rrasul
vekalu rabbena inna eta`na sadetena vekuberaena feedallune-ssebil
rabbena atihim di`feyni mine-l`azabi vel`anhum la`nen kebira
